title: He lost my vote
author: VD
content_html:
“You’ve got to put the video game away once in a while.”
– Barack Obama

You know, I might have been willing to overlook the socialist economics, the third-world affinities, the black supremacist ties, the foreign policy blather, the annoying wife, the mystic logic and the weird messiah complex. But now, Mr. Magic Negro, now you’ve simply gone too far! That’s just crazy talk!
